import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react' import logo from './../../logo.png' export class MenuPage extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { tweets } } render() { // const{tweets,allUsers}=this.state //console.log('followingss->',this.props.followingData) const{fistname,lastname,username}=this.props.loggedUserData const{tweets}=this.state return (
{/* Renders the side menu */}

))}

) } } export default MenuPage
